text:
Original Article✍️#Nonclinical #safety, #tolerance and #pharmacodynamics evaluation for meplazumab treating #chloroquine-resistant Plasmodium falciparum. These nonclinical data facilitated the initiation of an ongoing clinical trial of meplazumab.
